Reviews.Title: Did Not Work
Reviews.Author: Ruth Garner
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad to use but when we got it the speaker did not work.  The person you talked to could not hear you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Srobel
Reviews.Content: This phone works great. Excellent:) I bought this phone for my fiancé since he breaks his phones all the time. Perfect phone for the guys that fish hunt or work in construction I would recommend this phone to anyone :)

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price!
Reviews.Author: Joanne Normand/flow technology
Reviews.Content: Great phone for hard working person!nice loud ringers, no trouble hearing in loud work area'seasy to use works great..

Reviews.Title: Microphone does not work
Reviews.Author: Maryland
Reviews.Content: When I am talking, I have to speak loudly directly into the microphone, and often the other party can't hear me.  I have found that if I put the phone on speaker, the other party can hear, but then the conversation is not private.  Reprogramming did not help.  I want to return it and see if this is just my phone or a general problem.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy with my phone.
Reviews.Author: Becky Kelso
Reviews.Content: When I received my phone I had a problem being able to charge the battery.  The manufacturer worked with me and sent me a new phone.  I am 100 % satisfied with them and my phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Jessie
Reviews.Content: This has been a great phone. The battery life is great, Everything is great. I highly recommend it. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from them
Reviews.Author: LindseyN
Reviews.Content: I have purchased two phones from this seller and each one has been messed up. The first one wouldnt activate, so I had to buy another and then that one worked for 1 day and cut off never to cut on again. when I tried to contact them I got an email from amazon saying that the email they provided to amazon was invalid. and therefore there was no way to reach them. $200, 2 useless phones later and I still dont have one that works.

Reviews.Title: good purchase seems to be  a good phone
Reviews.Author: Lee Patterson
Reviews.Content: good durable phone the only  concern is battery goes down in one day, the camera has good resolution and phone is easy to use

Reviews.Title: The Rock rocks.
Reviews.Author: Michael D Jones
Reviews.Content: Smart phones are not for every one. Those of us who use more than just our thumbs to execute our job tasks need  a phone that is reliable and durable. The Rock fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: shivers
Reviews.Content: this has been the best phone for my husband. he is forever losing it or dropping it and it is tough. I wish I could buy a whole bunch of them, so when one runs out, I have one to replace it.... :)

Reviews.Title: to whom it may concern
Reviews.Author: arnold wehmeyer
Reviews.Content: u cant read the front screen of the phone and the phone does not charge on the dock at all

Reviews.Title: Casio Waterproof phone
Reviews.Author: Fay I Fisher
Reviews.Content: This is the third phone like this my husband has had and he loves it. He likes it because its easy for him to use.

Reviews.Title: Does not live up to "Waterproof" expectations
Reviews.Author: Leif Calvin
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone I would not have to worry about on the water.  This phone got a little wet in my canoe and the screen shut down.  Took 6 days to dry out, it now works again but the screen is still fuzzy in the background.

Reviews.Title: this was a christmas gift
Reviews.Author: leftylily "leftylily"
Reviews.Content: My husband needed a new phone and this was a perfect gift for him.  I worked just fine and came new in a box.  Shipping was very quick and it did all it said it would.  good purchase.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: I'm 64. This phone is water proof, Dials out and rings when someone calls. That's all I need except maybe an alarm that would ring when I push the search button on my key ring  as long as I haven't lost them!!LOL. I love this simple yet very functional phone.

Reviews.Title: Real sturdy phone
Reviews.Author: Ana M. Ballesteros
Reviews.Content: Actually I bought the phone for someone else and he works in construction and thinks it's the best.  He has broken lots of phone but said this is the most sturdy phone he has ever had.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: M. DeHut
Reviews.Content: I was told that this was a really great phone and very durable.  I do not agree.  It is very hard to hear a caller and you have to talk right into the phone or you will not be heard either.  It does seem to be fairly durable, I have had it several months and it still works, lol.

Reviews.Title: Casio GzOne Rock 731
Reviews.Author: LindaS
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for someone that drops their phones. My husband had his last one for over 4 years and the only problem was where you hook the cord into the phone went bad so he couldn't charge the phone. This one is working great.I would suggest this phone for any one that works outside and sweats a lot.

Reviews.Title: NOT WATERPROOF!
Reviews.Author: Jay A. Young
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because it was supposed to be waterproof.  I had it 2 days when it got wet and it died completely.  I have had non-waterproof phones survive much worse!  I would definitely not recommend this product.  If you are looking for a burly/waterproof phone go with the Ravine.

Reviews.Title: the rock cell phone
Reviews.Author: tractor
Reviews.Content: Casio GzOne Rock 731 I had two of theses phones no good got them wet they started to screw up people could not hear me and I could not hear them with out a Bluetooth . like the sizes of the phone and hard to text , good camera charging  ports were not the same on the two phones .

Reviews.Title: It's Valerie proof!
Reviews.Author: valerie schwartz
Reviews.Content: This phone is a replacement for one just like it. This new one is even better than my old one.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pedometer, Thermometer, Compass
2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion to 16 GB; access to personal email and instant messaging services
Ruggedized clamshell phone that's shock-, dust-, and water-resistant; outdoor software tools include earth compass, thermometer, and more
Advanced phone features - Speakerphone and Voice Activated Dialing, One-Touch open switch, and more
Your purchase will include a Cell Phone, Rechargable Battery, and Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Casio GzOne Rock 731 Waterproof 3G GPS Camera Cell Phone Verizon or Page Plus Pre-Paid No Contract Required
